Network visualization of co-authors from [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=fAkRXQoAAAAJ&hl=en)

```{r}
library(scholarnetwork)
library(networkD3)

net <- extractNetwork(id="fAkRXQoAAAAJ", n=500)
nodes = net$nodes
edges = net$edges
width = 800
height = 800
opacity = 0.75
fontsize = 25
charge = -150

df <- data.frame(
    Source=as.numeric(factor(edges$node1, levels=nodes$label))-1,
    Target=as.numeric(factor(edges$node2, levels=nodes$label))-1,
    value=edges$weight)

networkD3::forceNetwork(Links = df, Nodes = nodes, Source="Source", Target="Target",
                        NodeID = "label", Group = "group", linkWidth = 1,
                        Nodesize = "degree", fontSize=fontsize, fontFamily="sans-serif",
                        opacity = opacity, charge=charge,
                        width = width, height = height,
                        zoom = TRUE, bounded = TRUE)

```
